title: Problem-Finding Competency Enhancement Program for Creative Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary scientific knowledge and understanding of problem-solving processes
context.additional_context: Activity design focusing on real-time collaboration, asynchronous discussions using digital devices, and problem identification/reconstruction of scientific phenomena

learning_goals: Learners can systematically identify problems by applying the four strategies of the Problem Discovery Model (Resource Management, Elaboration, Analysis, Manipulation) in the field of science.
Learners can analyze real-world scientific cases to identify the limitations of existing solutions and formulate new problem statements.
Learners can validate problems discovered through peer feedback from multiple perspectives and derive improvement plans.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
